document.full_text: the tenor of upcoming contract talks between ford motor co  and its union will be different from years past, with an emphasis on improving competitiveness and maintaining earnings momentum, ford chief executive alan mulally said on thursday.
document.title: ford, uaw talks to have "different dynamic": ceo
lines_and_colors: the tenor of upcoming contract talks between ford motor co  and its union will be different from years past, with an emphasis on improving competitiveness and maintaining earnings momentum, ford chief executive alan mulally said on thursday.
